org.apache.sling.caconfig.spi

Packages that use org.apache.sling.caconfig.spi
Package
Description
org.apache.sling.caconfig.impl.def
 
org.apache.sling.caconfig.impl.metadata
 
org.apache.sling.caconfig.impl.override
 
org.apache.sling.caconfig.management
Management API of the Context-Aware configuration implementation.
org.apache.sling.caconfig.management.multiplexer
Multiplexer services provide aggregated access to all implementations of the related SPI interface.
org.apache.sling.caconfig.spi
SPI for applications hooking into the configuration infrastructure for parameterizing and customizing.
  • Classes in org.apache.sling.caconfig.spi used by org.apache.sling.caconfig.impl.def
    Class
    Description
    ConfigurationCollectionPersistData
    Data for persisting configuration collections.
    ConfigurationInheritanceStrategy
    Defines how (and if) resources in a resource hierarchy should inherit form each other.
    ConfigurationInjectResourceDetectionStrategy
    Defines how to look up the current context resource to be used for getting the context-aware configurations for injecting into Sling Models or for Sling Scripting (BindingsValuesProvider).
    ConfigurationPersistData
    Data for persisting configuration properties.
    ConfigurationPersistenceStrategy2
    Defines how configuration data is stored in the configuration resource.
  • Classes in org.apache.sling.caconfig.spi used by org.apache.sling.caconfig.impl.metadata
    Class
    Description
    ConfigurationMetadataProvider
    Allows applications to provide the necessary metadata for configurations.
  • Classes in org.apache.sling.caconfig.spi used by org.apache.sling.caconfig.impl.override
    Class
    Description
    ConfigurationOverrideProvider
    Provide information to override configuration data.

    Description
    ConfigurationCollectionPersistData
    Data for persisting configuration collections.

    Class
    Description

    Defines how (and if) resources in a resource hierarchy should inherit form each other.

    Defines how to look up the current context resource to be used for getting the context-aware configurations for injecting into Sling Models or for Sling Scripting (BindingsValuesProvider).

  • Classes in org.apache.sling.caconfig.spi used by org.apache.sling.caconfig.spi
    Class
    Description
